<title level="1" right="Action">[Mount](/Actions.aspx?ID=96) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 472 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Requirements** You are adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

</column>

---

You move onto the creature and ride it. If you’re already mounted, you can instead use this action to dismount, moving off the mount into a space adjacent to it.
name: Mount
requirement: You are adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.
